    dp[0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        dp[i] = 0;
    }

    vector<bool> possible(n + 2, false);

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int val;
        cin >> val;

        // Case 1: length is after the segment
        int j = i - val - 1;
        if (j >= 0 && dp[j]) {
            dp[i] = 1;
        }

        // Case 2: length is before the segment
        if (possible[i]) {
            dp[i] = 1;
        }

        // Update possible for future positions
        if (dp[i]) {
            int next_i = i + val;
            if (next_i <= n) {
                possible[next_i] = true;
            }
        }
    }

    if (dp[n] == 1) {
        cout << "YES\n";
    } else {
        cout << "NO\n";
    }
}
